gear.name: fsl-superbet2
gear.label: FSL: SUPER Brain Extraction Tool (BET2)
gear.description: Modified Brain Extraction Tool 2 (BET2) from FMRIB Software Library (FSL) v5.0 called SuperBET2 deletes non-brain tissue from an image of the whole head. It can also estimate the inner and outer skull surfaces, and outer scalp surface, if you have good quality T1.
gear.author: Sina Aslan, Ph.D.

fractional_intensity_threshold.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); default=0.05; smaller values give larger brain outline estimates. Changing Fractional intensity threshold from its default value of 0.5 will cause the overall segmented brain to become larger (<0.5) or smaller (>0.5). This threshold must lie between 0 and 1.

nifti.description: Input T1 NIfTI file for BET algorithm.

invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for FSL: SUPER Brain Extraction Tool (BET2)
